items.name: event_1
items.label: Leave Limgrave, light a bonfire in Liurnia/Caelid/Beyond

items.name: event_2
items.label: Visit Roundtable Hold

items.name: event_3
items.label: Kill Godrick the Grafted

items.name: event_4
items.label: Aquire a second Great Rune

items.name: event_5
items.label: Kill Rennala

items.name: event_6
items.label: Visit Volcano Manor

items.name: event_7
items.label: Complete the Volcano Manor Questline

items.name: event_8
items.label: Kill Rykard

items.name: event_9
items.label: Visit Mohgwyn's Palace

items.name: event_10
items.label: Reach the Altus Plataeu

items.name: event_11
items.label: Reach the Royal Capital

items.name: event_12
items.label: Enter the Academy of Raya Lucaria

items.name: event_13
items.label: Kill Morgott

items.name: event_14
items.label: Reach the Mountaintops of the Giants

items.name: event_15
items.label: Kill the Fire Giant

items.name: event_16
items.label: Reach Crumbling Farum Azula

items.name: event_17
items.label: Kill Maliketh, The Black Blade

items.name: event_18
items.label: Kill Radahn

items.name: event_19
items.label: Kill the Leonine Misbegotten

items.name: event_20
items.label: Kill Malenia

items.name: item_roderika_1
items.label: Meet Roderika at the Stormhill Shack

items.name: item_roderika_2
items.label: Find the Chrysalid's Memento deep in Stormveil Castle

items.name: item_roderika_3
items.label: Return the Memento to Roderika

items.name: item_roderika_4
items.label: Go to Roderika's previous location at Stormhill Shack

items.name: item_roderika_5
items.label: Talk to Rodericka and Master Hewg until she moves to sitting near him

items.name: item_roderika_6
items.label: Go back to where you found the Memento for a Crimson Hood

items.name: item_boc_1
items.label: Hit the talking tree and talk to Boc

items.name: item_boc_2
items.label: Go to Coastal Cave, talk to Boc

items.name: item_boc_3
items.label: Kill the boss and return the Sewing Needle to Boc

items.name: item_boc_4
items.label: Meet Boc next to the the Lake-Facing Cliffs Grace and talk to him

items.name: item_boc_5
items.label: Grab the Gold Sewing Needle from the Church of Vows

items.name: item_boc_6
items.label: Buy a piece of boss gear from Enia, and give the Gold Needle to Boc

items.name: item_boc_7
items.label: Meet Boc at the East Capital Rampart in Leyndell Royal Capital

items.name: item_boc_8
items.label: Talk to Boc until he says he is ugly, offer him a Larval Tear

items.name: item_boc_9
items.label: Talk to Boc in Renalla's boss room, reload the area again to find him dead

items.name: item_boc_10
items.label: Visit Hermit Village to find the Prattling-Pate: You're Beautiful

items.name: item_boc_11
items.label: Talk to Boc until he says he is ugly, use the Prattling-Pate: You're Beautiful

items.name: item_varre_1
items.label: Talk to White Faced Varre by the First Step

items.name: item_varre_2
items.label: Talk to White Faced Varre at Rose Church and recieve Festering Bloody Fingers

items.name: item_varre_3
items.label: Invade three players

items.name: item_varre_4
items.label: Return to Varre to recieve the Lord of Blood's Favor

items.name: item_varre_5
items.label: Interact with the corpse at the Church of Inhibition or the corpse at Chapel of Anticipation

items.name: item_varre_6
items.label: Return to Varre to gain the Bloody Finger and the Pureblood Knights Medal

items.name: item_varre_7
items.label: Kill the invader in Mohgwyn's Palace three times

items.name: item_varre_8
items.label: Duel White Faced Varre

items.name: item_thops_1
items.label: Talk to Thops in the Church of Irith

items.name: item_thops_2
items.label: Find the spare Glintstone Key on top of a Chandelier in the Church of the Cuckoo's inside of the Academy

items.name: item_thops_3
items.label: Return to Thops and give him the Glintstone Key

items.name: item_thops_4
items.label: Travel to Schoolhouse Classroom Grace in the Academy and loot Thops's body just outside and around the corner

items.name: item_gurranq_1
items.label: Go North of the Third Church of Marika and into the water to find a Sending Gate. Use it to find the Bestial Sanctum and talk to Gurranq

items.name: item_gurranq_2
items.label: Give Gurranq 4 deathroots

items.name: item_gurranq_3
items.label: Return to the Bestial Sanctum and subdue Gurranq

items.name: item_gurranq_4
items.label: Give Gurranq 5 more deathroots, for a total of 9

items.name: item_corhyn_1
items.label: Talk to Corhyn in Roundtable Hold

items.name: item_corhyn_2
items.label: Jump off the balcony in Roundtable Hold and kill Mad Tongue Alberich

items.name: item_corhyn_3
items.label: Talk to Brother Corhyn and he will announce he is leaving

items.name: item_corhyn_4
items.label: Talk to Brother Corhyn on the Altus Junction

items.name: item_corhyn_5
items.label: Talk to Goldmask

items.name: item_corhyn_6
items.label: Return to Corhyn and tell him of Goldmasks whereabouts

items.name: item_corhyn_7
items.label: Return to Goldmask to find Corhyn by his side

items.name: item_corhyn_8
items.label: Talk to Corhyn and Goldmask in hill near West Capital Rampart

items.name: item_corhyn_9
items.label: Find the Golden Order Principia and give it to Corhyn or Miriel to learn the Law of Regression

items.name: item_corhyn_10
items.label: Travel West of the Erdtree Sanctuary Grace and down an elevator and stairs to find a message on the ground. Stand on the message and face the statue then cast Law of Regression. Touch the newly formed message then talk to Goldmask and Corhyn.

items.name: item_corhyn_11
items.label: Travel to the Stargazer's Ruins in the North section of the Mountaintops of the Giants and talk to Corhyn and Goldmask

items.name: item_corhyn_12
items.label: Find the corpse of Goldmask on the West side of Erdtree Sanctuary Grace, past a few plants for the Mending Rune of Perfect Order. Reload and check Goldmask again for his armour. Corhyn can be found on the bridge near Stargazer Ruins, kill him for his armour and weapon

items.name: item_yura_1
items.label: Talk to Yura South-East of the lake in Limgrave under an overpass

items.name: item_yura_2
items.label: Kill Flying Dragon Agheel and return to Yura

items.name: item_yura_3
items.label: Go north of lake agheel and kill the invader Bloody Finger Nerijus with Yura

items.name: item_yura_4
items.label: Go north of where you were invaded by Nerijus to find Yura. Talk with him

items.name: item_yura_5
items.label: Interact with the red summon sign past the seal at Raya Lucaria Academy, talk with Yura after the fight

items.name: item_yura_6
items.label: Go to the Second Church of Marika. Talk to Yura then Kill the invader

items.name: item_sellen_1
items.label: Talk to Sellen under Waypoint Ruins

items.name: item_sellen_2
items.label: Go to the Hermit Village in the West part of Mt. Gelmir and find an old man named Primeval Sorceror Azur who has a crystal for a head and gives the spell Comet Azur

items.name: item_sellen_3
items.label: Talk to Sellen

items.name: item_sellen_4
items.label: Go through Sellia Hideaway and at the bottom you will find a seal guarded by a sorceror. Kill him and open the seal then talk to Master Lusat

items.name: item_sellen_5
items.label: After killing Radahn speak to Witch Hunter Jerren

items.name: item_sellen_6
items.label: Speak to Sellen

items.name: item_sellen_7
items.label: Head to Witchbane Ruins and talk to Sellen

items.name: item_sellen_8
items.label: Go through the Illusory wall in the Three Sisters to find Sellen and interact with her

items.name: item_sellen_9
items.label: Return to Sellen in Witchbane Ruins and talk to Witch Hunter Jerren

items.name: item_sellen_10
items.label: Go to the Grand Library Grace and walk out to find 2 Summon Signs. Summon Sellen

items.name: item_sellen_11
items.label: Talk to Sellen and reload the area to get her helmet

items.name: item_sellen_12
items.label: Revisit Azur and Lusat to get their helmets

items.name: item_sellen_13
items.label: Go to the Grand Library Grace and walk out to find 2 Summon Signs. Summon Jerren

items.name: item_tanith_1
items.label: Talk to Tanith in Volcano Manor

items.name: item_tanith_2
items.label: Complete your first Volcano Manor contract, Old Knight Istvan

items.name: item_tanith_3
items.label: Complete your second Volcano Manor contract, Rileigh the Idle

items.name: item_tanith_4
items.label: Complete your third Volcano Manor contract, Juno Hoslow

items.name: item_tanith_5
items.label: Talk to Lady Tanith in Rykard's Boss Room

items.name: item_boggart_1
items.label: Head to Boilprawn Shack and buy Rya's necklace

items.name: item_boggart_2
items.label: Buy some boiled prawns from Boggart

items.name: item_boggart_3
items.label: Meet Boggart by the Leyndell moat, buy some crab then talk to him

items.name: item_rya_1
items.label: Talk to Rya and agree to get her necklace back

items.name: item_rya_2
items.label: Return the necklace to Rya

items.name: item_rya_3
items.label: Meet Rya in the Altus Plataeu to get a teleport to Volcano Manor

items.name: item_rya_4
items.label: Talk to Rya in Volcano Manor

items.name: item_rya_5
items.label: Reload the area and talk to Rya in Volcano Manor in her snake form, then talk to Lady Tanith

items.name: item_rya_6
items.label: Reload the area and talk to Rya in Volcano Manor in her human form, and explore the area behind the illusory wall until you find the prison town church grace

items.name: item_rya_7
items.label: Tell Rya What you have seen

items.name: item_rya_8
items.label: Defeat Godskin Noble in Temple of Eiglay to get the Serpent's Amnion, give it to Rya

items.name: item_rya_9
items.label: Speak to Lady Tanith to recieve the Tonic of Forgetfulness

items.name: item_rya_10
items.label: Find Rya past the Temple of Eiglay

items.name: item_rya_11
items.label: Give Rya the Tonic and return to Lady Tanith

items.name: item_rya_12
items.label: Either kill Rya or let her live

items.name: item_rya_13
items.label: After Rykard, return to Rya and talk to her, repload the area and collect her items

items.name: item_patches_1
items.label: At the end of Murkwater Cave, open the chest to trigger the fight

items.name: item_patches_2
items.label: Kill Patches

items.name: item_patches_3
items.label: Be careful not to kill Patches!

items.name: item_patches_4
items.label: Reload the area and talk to patches to access his shop

items.name: item_patches_5
items.label: Talk to patches again, reload the area, then open the chest he gives you

items.name: item_patches_6
items.label: Return to Patches and talk to him again

items.name: item_patches_7
items.label: Talk to Patches on Scenic Isle

items.name: item_patches_8
items.label: Follow Patches 'Advice' and get captured by the Virgin Abductor at the bottom of the Academy

items.name: item_patches_9
items.label: Talk to Patches in Volcano Manor, and recieve his letter

items.name: item_patches_10
items.label: Kill Great Horned Tragoth, and return to patches

items.name: item_patches_11
items.label: Find Patches in the Shaded Castle

items.name: item_patches_12
items.label: Find Patches in the Shaded Castle, take the Dancer's Castonettes, then kill him (may change if more is discovered)

items.name: item_patches_13
items.label: Go to Rykard's Boss room and give Tanith the Castonettes

items.name: item_bernahl_1
items.label: Talk to Knight Bernahl in the Warmaster's Shack during the day

items.name: item_bernahl_2
items.label: Talk to Knight Bernahl at Volcano Manor

items.name: item_bernahl_3
items.label: Talk to Knight Bernahl to get the Letter to Bernahl

items.name: item_bernahl_4
items.label: Join with Bernahl to fight the two tarnished

items.name: item_bernahl_5
items.label: Return to Bernahl at Volcano Manor

items.name: item_bernahl_6
items.label: Kill Bernahl when he invades in Crumbling Farum Azula

items.name: item_alexander_1
items.label: Free Alexander from near the Saint's Bridge in Limgrave

items.name: item_alexander_2
items.label: Talk to Alexander in Gael Tunnel

items.name: item_alexander_3
items.label: Talk to Alexander in Redmane Castle

items.name: item_alexander_4
items.label: Talk to Alexander in Radahn's Boss Room

items.name: item_alexander_5
items.label: Free Alexander from near Ciaran Study Hall using an Oil Pot

items.name: item_alexander_6
items.label: Find Alexander by Seethewater Teminus in Mt Gelmir

items.name: item_alexander_7
items.label: Summon Alexander for the Fire Giant fight (optional)

items.name: item_alexander_8
items.label: Duel Alexander in Crumbling Farum Azula and take his remains

items.name: item_diallos_1
items.label: Talk to Diallos in Roundtable Hold

items.name: item_diallos_2
items.label: Talk to Diallos near Academy Gate Town, then return to Roundtable Hold and talk to him again

items.name: item_diallos_3
items.label: Talk to Diallos in Volcano Manor

items.name: item_diallos_4
items.label: Talk to Diallos again after completing Volcano Manor

items.name: item_diallos_5
items.label: Talk to Diallos again after disbanding Volcano Manor

items.name: item_diallos_6
items.label: Go to Jarburg and talk to Diallos and Jar-Bairn, reload until Diallos Dies a Hero

items.name: item_diallos_7
items.label: Give Alexander's Innard to Jar-Bairn to get the Companion Jar Talisman.

items.name: item_kenneth_1
items.label: Talk to Kenneth Haight north of the Mistwood

items.name: item_kenneth_2
items.label: Defeat the enemy at the top of Fort Haight then go back to Kenneth for a reward

items.name: item_kenneth_3
items.label: Talk to Kenneth at the top of Fort Haight

items.name: item_nepheli_1
items.label: After reaching Stormveil's main gate, talk to Gostac and take his advice

items.name: item_nepheli_2
items.label: Find and talk to Nepheli before Godrick, optionally summon her for the boss fight

items.name: item_nepheli_3
items.label: After Godrick reload the area and talk to Gostac

items.name: item_nepheli_4
items.label: Talk to Nepheli in Roundtable Hold, then talk to Gideon abour her

items.name: item_nepheli_5
items.label: Talk to Nepheli in the Village of the Albinaurics, then kill the nearby Omen Killer

items.name: item_nepheli_6
items.label: Return to Roundtable Hold and talk to her and Gideon to exhaust their dialogue

items.name: item_nepheli_7
items.label: Take it to Gideon instead and report back to Seluvis

items.name: item_nepheli_8
items.label: Get to the Chapel of Anticipation in the Great Belfries to find the Stormhawk King's Ashes

items.name: item_nepheli_9
items.label: Return to Roundtable Hold, give the Stormhawk King's Ashes to Nepheli

items.name: item_nepheli_10
items.label: Go back to the Stormveil Castle Boss room and rest to find Kenneth, Nepheli and Gostac. Talk to them and you will receive an Ancient Dragon Smithing Stone and can buy another from Gostac

items.name: item_blaidd_1
items.label: Go to Mistwood Ruins to hear a wolf howl

items.name: item_blaidd_2
items.label: Talk to Kale and tell him about the Howling to get the Finger Snap gesture

items.name: item_blaidd_3
items.label: Return to the Mistwood Ruins and use the Finger Snap gesture to talk to Blaidd

items.name: item_blaidd_4
items.label: Fight Darriwil at the Forlorn Hound Evergaol (optionally summon Blaidd for this fight), then talk to Blaidd afterwards

items.name: item_blaidd_5
items.label: Release Blaidd from the Forlorn Hound Evergaol

items.name: item_blaidd_6
items.label: Talk to Iji about Blaidd

items.name: item_blaidd_7
items.label: Find Blaidd outside Ranni's Rise, Defeat him and return to Iji

items.name: item_rogier_1
items.label: Talk to Rogier in Stormveil Castle

items.name: item_rogier_2
items.label: Talk to Rogier in Roundtable Hold

items.name: item_rogier_3
items.label: Defeat the Lesser Ulcerated Tree Spirit under Stormveil Castle, continue on to find what looks to be an ancient, rotting face. Just in front of the face is a bloodstain. Activate it to view a memory

items.name: item_rogier_4
items.label: Return to the Roundtable and ask Rogier about the face

items.name: item_rogier_5
items.label: Talk to Fia and allow her to hold the Tarnished, Talk to her again in secret and exhaust her dialog

items.name: item_rogier_6
items.label: Talk to Fia and allow her to hold the Tarnished, Talk to her in secret and ask 'About the Black Knifeprint'

items.name: item_rogier_7
items.label: Go to the Black Knife Catacombs and retrieve the Black Knifeprint

items.name: item_rogier_8
items.label: Return the Black Knifeprint to Rogier, reload the area and talk to him again

items.name: item_rogier_8
items.label: Return the Black Knifeprint to Rogier, reload the area and talk to him again

items.name: item_rogier_9
items.label: Return to Rogier, then return to Ranni again

items.name: item_rogier_10
items.label: Return to Rogier and reload the area until he falls asleep

items.name: item_rogier_11
items.label: Teleport into Roundtable Hold from another site of Grace, collect Rogiers items

items.name: item_ranni_1
items.label: Talk to Ranni/Renna at the Church of Elleh

items.name: item_ranni_2
items.label: Defeat Caria Manor then go West from the Manor to find Ranni's Rise. Talk to Ranni

items.name: item_ranni_3
items.label: Talk to Blaidd in Siofra River

items.name: item_ranni_4
items.label: Enter Nokron and recover the Fingerslayer Blade

items.name: item_ranni_5
items.label: Return the Fingerslayer Blade to Ranni to recieve the Carian Inverted Statue

items.name: item_ranni_6
items.label: Reach the top of the Divine Tower of Liurnia and collect the Cursemark of Death

items.name: item_ranni_7
items.label: Go to Renna's Rise and teleport to Ainsel River Main, where you can loot a Miniature Ranni doll

items.name: item_ranni_8
items.label: After entering the menu at the Ainsel River Main Site of Grace 'Talk to Ranni' three times

items.name: item_ranni_9
items.label: Kill the Baleful Shadow and talk to Ranni to recieve the Discarded Palace Key

items.name: item_ranni_10
items.label: Go to Rennala's boss room to open the locked chest to get the Dark Moon Ring

items.name: item_ranni_11
items.label: Continue to the Grand Cloister and use the coffin to reach Astel, Naturalborn of the Void

items.name: item_ranni_12
items.label: Continue to the Moonlight Altar, and enter the Cathedral of Manus Celes

items.name: item_ranni_13
items.label: Using the Dark Moon Ring on Ranni's body will reward the player with the Dark Moon Greatsword, Ranni's ending will now be avaliable after the final boss

items.name: item_seluvis_1
items.label: Go South of Ranni's Rise to the tower nearby to find Seluvis. He will give you a potion for Nepheli

items.name: item_seluvis_2
items.label: Give the Potion to Nephelli

items.name: item_seluvis_3
items.label: Give the Potion to Dung Eater

items.name: item_seluvis_4
items.label: Return to Seluvis

items.name: item_seluvis_5
items.label: Find Seluvis secret room in the Three Sisters and interact with his message

items.name: item_seluvis_6
items.label: Aquire a starlight shard

items.name: item_seluvis_7
items.label: Return to Seluvis and purchase one of his puppets

items.name: item_seluvis_8
items.label: Talk to Pidia, Ciaran Servant

items.name: item_seluvis_9
items.label: Purchase all of Seluvis's sorceries, then talk to him again

items.name: item_seluvis_9
items.label: Aquire an Amber Starlight shard from the Altus Plataeu, and give it to Seluvis

items.name: item_seluvis_10
items.label: Reload the area and recieve the Amber Draught and give it to Ranni

items.name: item_seluvis_11
items.label: Return to Seluvis to find him dead

items.name: item_seluvis_12
items.label: Return to Seluvis to find him dead

items.name: item_seluvis_13
items.label: Return to Pidia

items.name: item_seluvis_14
items.label: Return to Pidia

items.name: item_irina_1
items.label: Talk to Irina in the Weeping Peninsula

items.name: item_irina_2
items.label: Give Irina's letter to Edgar in Castle Morne

items.name: item_irina_3
items.label: Return to Irina to find her dead

items.name: item_irina_4
items.label: Talk to Edgar again

items.name: item_irina_5
items.label: Find Edgar next to Irina and talk to him

items.name: item_irina_6
items.label: Travel to the Revenger's Shack and kill Edgar the Revenger

items.name: item_dungeater_1
items.label: Speak to Dung Eater in Roundtable Hold

items.name: item_dungeater_2
items.label: Aquire a Seedbed Curse and give it to Dung Eater

items.name: item_dungeater_3
items.label: Find Dung Eater in the Subterranean Shunning-Grounds

items.name: item_dungeater_4
items.label: Go to Dung Eater's room in Roundtable Hold and read his Message

items.name: item_dungeater_5
items.label: Defeat Dung Eater in the Leyndell outer moat, then talk to him again in Roundtable Hold

items.name: item_dungeater_6
items.label: Aquire 5 Seedbed Curses and give them to Dung Eater in the Subterranean Shunning-Grounds

items.name: item_albus_1
items.label: Hit the pot in the Village of the Albinaurics and talk to Albus to recieve the Haligtree Secret Medallion (Right)

items.name: item_albus_2
items.label: Go to Roundtable Hold and fight Ensha

items.name: item_albus_3
items.label: Kill Commander Niall in Castle Sol to collect the Haligtree Secret Medallion (Left)

items.name: item_albus_4
items.label: Travel to the Concecrated Snowfield using the Secret Medallion

items.name: item_latenna_1
items.label: Go through the Lakeside Crystal Cave to reach the Slumbering Wolf's Shack

items.name: item_latenna_2
items.label: Talk to Latenna to recieve her Spirit Ash

items.name: item_latenna_3
items.label: Reach the Apostate Derelict located in the Consecrated Snowfield and summon Latenna at the foot of the giant Albinauric woman

items.name: item_gowry_1
items.label: Talk to Gowry in Gowry's Shack

items.name: item_gowry_2
items.label: Kill Commander O'Neal to get the Unalloyed Gold Needle

items.name: item_gowry_3
items.label: Return the Needle to Gowry and He will Repair it

items.name: item_gowry_4
items.label: Return to Gowry and buy all of his spells

items.name: item_millicent_1
items.label: Give the Needle to Millicent in the Church of Plague, reload the area and talk to her again, reload the area again and talk to her at Gowry's Shack

items.name: item_millicent_2
items.label: Talk to Millicent in the Altus Plataeu by the Erdtree-Gazing Hill Grace

items.name: item_millicent_3
items.label: Go to the Shaded Castle and Retrieve the Valkyrie's Prosthesis, return to Millicent and give it to her

items.name: item_millicent_4
items.label: Kill the Godskin Noble in Dominula, Windmill Village, reload the area and talk to Millicent

items.name: item_millicent_5
items.label: Talk to Millicent at the Ancient Snow Valley Ruins Grace in the Mountaintop of the Giants

items.name: item_millicent_6
items.label: Light the fires around Ordina, Liturgical Town to reach Miquella's Haligtree

items.name: item_millicent_7
items.label: Continue to the Drainage Channel Grace, trabel up the ladder and cross the branch to fight a Defiled Root Monster. Kill it then reload the area

items.name: item_millicent_8
items.label: Activate the Red Summon Sign by the Defiled Root Monster has you invade Millicent and kill her, giving you Millicent's Prosthesis for the deed

items.name: item_millicent_9
items.label: Activate the Summon Sign by the Defiled Root Monster and assist her to fight her sisters, reload the area again to get the Unalloyed Gold Needle

items.name: item_millicent_10
items.label: Use the Unalloyed Needle in Malenia's boss room

items.name: item_millicent_11
items.label: Optionally use Miquella's Needle in Dragonlord Placidusax's arena to counteract the Frenzied Flame

items.name: item_hyetta_1
items.label: Meet Hyetta at the Lake-Facing Cliff Grace

items.name: item_hyetta_2
items.label: Grab the Shabriri Grape from under the throne room of Stormveil Castle

items.name: item_hyetta_3
items.label: In Purified Ruins, find the hidden floor in the center of the ruins to grab the Shabriri Grape within

items.name: item_hyetta_4
items.label: Find Hyetta in the North-West side of the Purified Ruins, and give her the grape

items.name: item_hyetta_5
items.label: Talk to Hyetta just north of Gate Town Bridge Grace, give her a Grape, then tell her what it was

items.name: item_hyetta_6
items.label: Talk to Hyetta a Bellum Church Grace, then kill Festering Fingerprint Vyke near the Church of Inhibition, and give her the Fingerprint Grape he drops

items.name: item_hyetta_7
items.label: From the Subterranean Shunning-Grounds, travel through the Cathederal of the Forsaken to reach the Frenzied Flame Proscription

items.name: item_hyetta_8
items.label: Remove your Armour and commune with the Three Fingers

items.name: item_d_1
items.label: Talk to D in Stormhill

items.name: item_d_2
items.label: Kill the Tibia Mariner in Summonwater Village to aquire a Deathroot, before leaving speak to D

items.name: item_d_3
items.label: Speak to D in Roundtable Hold

items.name: item_d_4
items.label: Give D's Armour to his brother, return to Fia to find her dead, reload the area again to get the twinned set back

items.name: item_fia_1
items.label: Talk to Fia to recieve the Weathered Dagger

items.name: item_fia_2
items.label: Give the Weathered Dagger to D, reload the area to loot his body and talk to Fia

items.name: item_fia_3
items.label: Travel to Deeproot Depths and fight Fia's Champions

items.name: item_fia_4
items.label: Talk to Fia and ask to be held, give her the cursemark, reload the area, and interact with her sleeping to fight Lichdragon Fortissax
